about_the_game:
"Toad tales" is a brutal mix of turn-based tactics and roguelike with RPG elements. You will encounter many different enemies, traps and dangers on your path to greatness. But being the greatest wouldn't make any sense without a challenge, would it?

    Features

  • Plenty of tactics: a lot of strong enemies will fight for the right to kill you, and most of them don't know how to work as a team. Take advantage of their short-sightedness and make them interfere with each other more than help. Every step you take can turn the tide of the battle!
  • Variety: start your journey with one of five unique weapons. Collect active and passive abilities, find powerful combinations and remember: the wrong choice can lead to a loss.
  • Blood system: gather the forces of defeated enemies and use them against those who are still lucky (or unlucky?) to survive. Expand your tactical capabilities, because this resource has many ways to use it!
